attributes.action: consider how many lives could be saved on our roads by adopting a new system of priorities used for years in some European countries where cars give way to bikes and cars/bikes give way to pedestrians, horses.  Pedestrians should have right of way/priority over all other road users - for example at junctions.   Bicycles and motorbikes should have right of way / priority over cars & lorries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
100's of preventable deaths & serious injuries occur on our roads

How many lives could be saved by adopting a new priority system used in countries like Germany where:

- cars MUST give way to bikes

- cars & bikes MUST give way to pedestrians

- Pedestrians have right of way/priority over all other road users e.g. at junctions

Too many children/teens on a phone & parents pushing buggies have to sprint over side roads between speeding cars

Bicycles & motorbikes should have right of way/priority over cars & lorries

WHY? safer, more polite, makes drivers take full responsibility for  dangerous vehicle under their control in all conditions

It would take time to trial & implement, but surely lives saved & road safety awareness would be worth it! & more might cycle- more healthy + less congestion!

Certain towns/cities could be invited to trial the system with large posters/leaflets to explain it.  Start with Garrison towns where many are used to driving in Germany
